events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position. The applicant has relevant experience in backend development and cloud technologies.
The candidateâ€™s resume has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster, specifically for the Backend Developer role due to strong skills in Java and AWS.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to coordinate the upcoming technical screening and ensure prompt communication throughout the hiring process.
The initial phone screening was completed, and the candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and a good cultural fit, advancing to the technical interview phase.
We have scheduled the technical interview for the candidate on May 15th at 10:00 AM UTC to assess coding skills and architectural knowledge with the engineering team.
